title: Large-Scale Education on IT-Supported Financial Counseling Decision-Making Processes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary financial products and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: IT-enhanced customer advisory training for financial professionals: Practice-based curriculum overcoming limitations of conventional consultation methods

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze clients' risk profiles and financial goals using IT tools during financial counseling.
Learners can generate and explain client-friendly visualizations through decision support systems.
Learners can design personalized counseling scenarios that enhance clients' financial literacy by applying trained counseling processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
